Job Title: Brand Assistant

Location: Columbus, Ohio Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Marketing, Sales

Description:
As a Sales and Brand Assistant, you will be instrumental in driving brand development, implementing sales strategies, and ensuring consistent brand messaging across various channels in Columbus, OH. This is an exciting opportunity for a detail-oriented and creative individual to contribute to our brand's growth and make a meaningful impact on sales and brand success.
We are seeking a passionate and driven individual to join our team as a Brand Assistant. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in representing our brand, engaging with customers face to face, driving sales, and cultivating long-lasting relationships in the Columbus area. This position offers an exciting opportunity for career growth within our company, and we are looking for candidates who are enthusiastic about stepping into leadership roles.
Responsibilities:Engage with customers in a friendly and professional manner, providing exceptional service and product knowledge.Actively participate in sales activities, including product demonstrations, upselling, and closing sales transactions.Build and maintain strong relationships with customers to foster loyalty and repeat business.Assist in the development and execution of marketing strategies to promote brand awareness and drive sales.Collaborate with the sales team to achieve targets and exceed performance metrics.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth.Provide feedback to management on customer preferences,
Qualifications:Previous experience in sales, customer service, or retail environment preferred.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Strong organizational and time management abilities.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.Passionate about delivering exceptional customer experiences.Proactive and self-motivated with a positive attitude.Bachelorâ€™s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field is a plus.
With a focus on quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction, we have established ourselves as a leader in the marketing industry. We believe in fostering a collaborative and empowering work environment where employees are encouraged to grow both personally and professionally.
**We are an equal opportunity employer located in Columbus, OH. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or any other protected status. We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where all individuals are valued and respected.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
